pullRequest.title: 1162 add openapi documentation for /beacon/state
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add openapi documentation for /beacon/state
Add Serializer for Bitlist and Bytes4 to Jackson
Add JsonIgnore to a bunch of sizings for objects so they don't appear in JSON output.
fixes
#1162
Signed-off-by: Paul Harris paul.harris@consensys.net
